name: Bike Mania Turbo
description:
- BIKE MANIA TURBO -

The original and most popular bike game, with MILLIONS of online plays, comes your iOS device for FREE!

* FEATURES *

- Real-time biking engine.

- 30 BRAND NEW BIGGER AND BETTER LEVELS!

- Takes advantage of HD RETINA display.

- Two ways to bike - Tilt your device or use the specially designed Slider system.
